name: Trasher Crasher
description:
When you finish playing first round you cant play agan, you need to restart the page becose the game loop is not done.

Controls:

A , D - Movement

Space - Start game

E - Punching

Mouse buttons - Special items

In this game you play as a penguin. You want to help team seas so you want to pick some trash from water.  You can pick every plastic. You cant pick up metal and destroyed boat. You have fishing rod too. Fishing rod can pick up light metal. You also have bombs. You can destroy hard metal and boats. If you dont have a bomb and a boat is blocking your way you can break it by pressing E and point your cursor on boat.

All project even umusic is made by me. Also soryy for wrong ui
